front.title: Mobility Procedures in Presence of Unknown MAC Route

abstract.t: The Interconnect Solution for Ethernet VPN defines Unknown MAC (Media Access Control) Route (UMR) utilization for Data Center Interconnect (DCI) when EVPN MPLS or EVPN VXLAN is an overlay network for such interconnects. This scenario impacts MAC mobility procedures and needs to be addressed. This document describes additional changes and enhancements required for MAC mobility procedures when using UMR..
